text: ryy anak mean phteah ampi measa ryy anak laeng tow leumekh . haey ( tohbeicha anak laeng tow leumekh kadaoy) ka yeung min chue nung kar laeng robsa anak der louhtrate anak banhchouh mk aoy puok yeung nouv kompir muoy ( pi a l laoh) daembi yeung nung sautr vea cheamoun sen . chaur anak pol tha mcheasa robsakhnhom mha brisotth. khnhom minmen chea avei krawpi chea mnoussa delke tengtang chea anakneasar noh laey
